Description_en:
Discover an excellent investment and end-user opportunity in Ajman Pearl Tower, located in the heart of Al Rashidiya 1, Ajman.

This corner 1-bedroom apartment offers a well-planned layout with 1,083.28 sq. ft. of total area, featuring partial creek views, abundant natural light, and a private balcony. The unit is unfurnished, allowing you to design the space to your personal taste.

Property Details:

1 Bedroom | 2 Bathrooms

Corner unit

Partial creek view

Built-up area: 1,083.28 sq. ft.

Open kitchen layout

Balcony

Covered parking

Amenities & Features:

Central air conditioning

24/7 security

Childrenâ€™s play area

Pet-friendly community

Well-maintained common areas

Financial Highlights:

Price: AED 584,798

Paid: AED 143,773

Balance: AED 441,025

Expected handover: Q1 2027

Attractive resale opportunity

Strategically located with easy access to main roads, retail, schools, and daily conveniences, this property is ideal for both investors seeking strong returns and end-users looking for comfortable urban living.
